methods.name: BlurEffect
methods.description: This methods creates a blur effect

methods.name: ColorBoostEffect
methods.description: Color boost technique is basically based on color filtering, which is to increase the intensity of a single color channel. For example: type = green/ blue or red; percent = 40%

methods.name: ColorFilter
methods.description: Set a color filter to your image. For example: red = 30; green = 40; blue = 20

methods.name: FlipPicture
methods.description: Flip your image vertical or horizontal. For example: type = 1 (vertical); type = 2 (horizontal)

methods.name: GammaEffect
methods.description: Set a gamma effect to your image. For example: red = 5; green = 10; blue = 20

methods.name: GreyscaleEffect
methods.description: Method for GreyscaleEffect

methods.name: HighlightEffect
methods.description: Set a highlight effect to your image

methods.name: HueFilter
methods.description: Change the hue of an image. For example: level = 1 or 2 or 3 or 4 ...

methods.name: ImageRotation
methods.description: Rotate the image to the degree you need it. For example: degree = 100

methods.name: InvertEffect
methods.description: This effect inverts your image

methods.name: MergeTwoImages
methods.description: This methods creates a new side by side horizontal image.

methods.name: Pixelate
methods.description: This methods creates a pixelate image effect

methods.name: RoundCorner
methods.description: Set a round corner to your image. For example: round = 45

methods.name: ScaleCenterCrop
methods.description: This methods creates a new scale center crop image

methods.name: SepiaToningEffect
methods.description: Set a sepia toning effect to your image. For example: depth = 20; red = 10; green = 20; blue = 25

methods.name: SetBrightness
methods.description: Change the brightness of your image. For example: value = 50 (maximum = 255=100% brightness)

methods.name: SetColorDepth
methods.description: Change the color depth of an image as you wish. For example: bitOffset = 32 (bit) or bitOffset = 16 (bit)

methods.name: SetContrast
methods.description: This changes the contrast of your image. For example: value = 20

methods.name: ShadingFilter
methods.description: Make a new image with a shading filter. For example: shadingColor = green(rgb value)

methods.name: TintColorEffect
methods.description: That's a pretty new other cool effect. It changes the tint color of your image. For example: degree = 100

methods.name: WatermarkEffect
methods.description: Set a watermark effect to an image and change the positon/size or color of the text. For example: text = hello; textSize = 25; textColor = red(rgb value); textAlphaValue = 255 (255= 100% visible,127.5= 50% visible, 0= 0% visible); pointX = 50; pointY = 100; text underline(boolean) = true or false

methods.name: isLandscape
methods.description: Return true if image is in landscape format, else return false.

methods.name: isPortrait
methods.description: Return true if image is in portrait format, else return false.

methods.name: isSquare
methods.description: Return true if image is in square format (means as high as wide or as wide as high), else return false.

blockProperties.name: SaveNewImageAs
blockProperties.description: Save the new created image to a folder/ name of your choice

name: ImageEditor
helpString: ImageEditor Extension by NMD | Release 11/06/2017 (Version 2) | Check out the blog for more informations: https://nmd-apps.jimdo.com
